attributes.action: keep local government local in North Yorkshire and rule out the proposal to create a unitary county council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A unitary county council would cover too large an area and too big a population to deliver true local government.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "keep local government local in North Yorkshire and rule out the proposal to create a unitary county council."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12954.asp

Prime Minister's Office
